alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 10:06PM CDT until July 10 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern La Crosse County in west central Wisconsin... Southeastern Trempealeau County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 1005 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galesville, or 14 miles east of Winona, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dakota and Brice Prairie around 1015 PM CDT. Onalaska and Holmen around 1025 PM CDT. La Crosse and French Island around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads M And W, Mindoro Cut, Severson Coulee, Camp Decorah, New Amsterdam, Perrot State Park and Stevenstown. People attending the Trempealeau County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
